TITLE: Episode 20 - Making a Cybercriminal
DESCRIPTION: Have you ever wanted to pick the brain of a cyber criminal? Friends for Fullerton’s Future is a blog that seeks to hold accountable the government and police department that oversaw and perpetrated the murder of Kelly Thomas. Joshua Ferguson joins us to discuss the attempted legal assassination that he and the blog are fighting in court over the “crime” of sharing public information.
